# WelcomeSecurity

> Danish application security consultancy based in Silkeborg, Denmark. We help developers and DevOps teams build secure software through hands-on collaboration, not just reports. Founded by Thomas L. Kristensen.

## What We Do

WelcomeSecurity acts as a "Security Sidekick" - an integrated, developer-friendly AppSec partner that works alongside development teams in their daily work. We participate in stand-ups, code reviews, architecture discussions, and help developers make better security decisions without slowing them down.

## Core Services

- **Security Sidekick**: Ongoing, flexible application security partnership embedded in your development process
- **Security Champions Program**: Build and train internal security advocates in your development teams
- **Secure Development Training**: From 2-hour demos to 10 ECTS university modules (IDA Learning, EADania, SmartLearning)
- **Threat Modeling & Risk Assessment**: Practical security analysis for features, services, and architectures
- **Compliance Support**: IEC 62443, ISO 27001, GDPR - implemented in practice, not just on paper

## Industries

Critical infrastructure, energy, finance, cloud/SaaS, manufacturing, maritime, public sector.

## Location

Silkeborg, Denmark. Works with clients throughout Denmark.

## Community

Active in OWASP Aarhus, BSides Aarhus, DevOps Meetup Aarhus, .NET Meetup Aarhus, AWS Meetup Aarhus.
